name: Helena Brandejsova
introduction: My aspiration is to guide organisations through purpose driven systematic change, towards sustainable and prosperous future. During my career I have helped number of organisations to change their ways of working and adopt agile mindset, principles and practices. I am supporting managers to embrace change and build productive workplace, while fostering caring, empathetic, and inclusive work culture.
top_3_advice: Create a common purpose and engage your people. Empower them to challenge current practices.

Do not get overwhelmed. Take it one step at a time. Changes might be slow or minor at first, but as your organization gets better understanding you can accelerate. Also, you are not alone. Join industry coalitions to share learnings.
Challenges are expected and a temporary dip in performance should be acceptable, however any organization needs to be profitable.
how_can_help: I can introduce agile ways of working into sustainability activities. I can support you in creating your sustainable business strategy.
sustainability_journey: I have a background in electrical engineering and what feels like eons of experience in the energy sector, mostly in consulting. Throughout my career I have seen the sector's transition in all parts of the value chain. Extremely slow at first, getting progressively more dynamic as we are realizing that change is inevitable. I believe that we all need to join the fight towards sustainable future, as individuals or as representatives of our organizations.
sustainable_actions: I am helping organizations to change their ways of working and adopt agile mindset, principles and practices. I believe that Agile is the approach to be used for implementing sustainable practices #agileforsustainability.
challenges_overcome: Changing ways of working is not easy. It is crucial to get everyone on board, engage the enthusiasts in the organization and get their support in promoting the change and their benefits. Share success stories as well as lessons learned.
most_proud_of: Successful agile transformations, empowering people to challenge current practices and suggest better and more sustainable approach.
background: Electrical engineering background with extensive energy sector consulting experience
core_methodology: #agileforsustainability - using Agile approach for implementing sustainable practices
transformation_focus: Helping organizations adopt agile mindset, principles and practices for sustainable change
energy_sector_insight: Witnessed energy sector transition from extremely slow to progressively more dynamic
change_management_philosophy: Purpose-driven systematic change toward sustainable and prosperous future
